name: Paganism the Game
description: Paganism the Game is a board game where you compete against other players for points which when tallied up at the end of the game will reveal a winner. The game features item cards, card which you can play for varying effects, event spaces which can cause good or bad outcomes, and money spaces which enable you to purchase items at one of the shops. The item deck consists of 44 Cards with 29 unique names and flavour text. This is a group project where I designed the board and gameplay.
